A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A phenomenal continuation of the Star Wars series\, that will most likely diving fans because it answers most of your questions but it may not be what you where expecting. As Luke says \"this is not going to go the way you think\" is very true. The Last Jedi is better than The Force Awakens but not as good as The Empire Strikes Back or A New Hope\, but sitting very good as the third best in the franchise!
